Text: in what way did it not work? i have checked it on 3 separate pc's and worked fine..
Error message:" Specified module not found"!!!!!!!!

that's very strange..as i said i had no issues using a usb on 3 pcs, with loading perfect and worked great..I am sorry for this issue..If anyone else seems to experience this issue please let me know, and i will look deeper into it. If it works for anyone else, please let me know as well..Thanks

Program came up fine, acted like it was working, even gave a "success" notification after the conversion and an option to open the folder in which the converted file was saved. But no file. Not even a placeholder. Tried several "installs." Tried multiple output folders in addition to the default folder. Nope. NFG
